synopsis.text: No. 6 takes place in a dystopian future where most of humanity lives inside six city-states that were established after a devastating world war. On the surface, these cities appear peaceful and perfect, but underneath lurks darkness and secrets. The story follows Shion, an elite resident of the technologically advanced city No. 6. As a child, Shion's privileged life is upended when he meets Nezumi, a mysterious fugitive boy. Although helping Nezumi makes Shion lose his elite status, years later fate reunites them. Together they uncover a sinister conspiracy tied to a series of unexplained deaths in No. 6. Shion and Nezumi embark on a dangerous adventure searching for the truth behind the utopian facade of No. 6. Along the way, they discover the city's shattering secrets and that not everything is as perfect as it seems. Their journey reveals the corruption and darkness that festers behind the walls of this supposed model city.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
